salesQuery: select * from ck_sales {where_block}  {DYNAMIC_FILTER} {hierarchy_condition} order by {DYNAMIC_SORT}  limit {DYNAMIC_LIMIT}
minimalSalesQuery: select id, beat, loginid, extended_attributes, net_amount, source, creation_time, order_number, status, invoice_number, inv_ser_no, supplierid, normalized_quantity, outletcode from ck_sales {where_block}  {DYNAMIC_FILTER} {hierarchy_condition} order by {DYNAMIC_SORT}  limit {DYNAMIC_LIMIT}
salesDetailsQuery: select salesdetails.* from  ck_sales_details salesdetails where salesdetails.sale_id in ({sales_ids})
salesHistoryQuery: select saleshistory.* from ck_sales_history saleshistory where saleshistory.sale_id in ({sales_ids})
minimalSalesDetailsQuery: select salesdetails.sale_id, salesdetails.batch_code, salesdetails.initial_case_quantity, salesdetails.initial_piece_quantity, salesdetails.initial_other_unit_quantity from ck_sales_details salesdetails where salesdetails.sale_id in ({sales_ids})
minimalSalesHistoryQuery: select saleshistory.sale_id, saleshistory.status from ck_sales_history saleshistory where saleshistory.sale_id in ({sales_ids})
